game.name: Session Notes: Night Vigil
game.shortDescription: Face the terror of the night shift. Luna is trapped in her hospital, stalked by a vengeful obsession. Survive the shifts, evade the jumpscares, and escape the nightmare in this psychological horror.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Face the terror of the night shift. Luna is trapped in her hospital, stalked by a vengeful obsession. Survive the shifts, evade the jumpscares, and escape the nightmare in this psychological horror.
